about.title: ABOUT US
about.paragraph1: We are a <bold>premium car service in Warsaw</bold> with a special focus on high-class vehicles. As an <bold>official partner of BMW and Mercedes-Benz</bold>, we are authorized to enter service records into the service book, which preserves warranty and gives confidence to every owner.
about.paragraph2: We service vehicles of brands like Porsche, Mercedes-Benz, Audi, Range Rover, and more, including motorcycles. We use <bold>original spare parts</bold> and <bold>professional equipment</bold>, and all work is performed by specialists who truly know what they’re doing.
